name: The Cosmic Web (NON-GAME JAM VERSION)
description:
A game I made for the Mini Jam.

You are a tiny spaceship in a world where all solid bodies have mysteriously vanished. You must travel a limited universe while fighting an evil group called the Red Conscript, who seek to destroy the universe and everything in it. 

The Red Conscript are a powerful and cruel enemy, and you are the only one left to stand in their way. It will be a difficult fight, but if anyone can save the universe, it’s you.

Currently, this game only has two missions, three boss fights (technically [also one is in development atm]), and five areas to explore.

I will 100% build on this world and game as time goes on.

Dont ask why I made a separate "project" for the full (non game jam) version of The Cosmic Web, i dont know either

Control with WASD or arrow keys, click to interact with your environment, press V to return to the Cosmic Web, and hold E to fire weapons (a feature that will be added soon).

The usage of clicking is minimized as much as possible.
